entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: DotInk: EInk Assistant
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly ProÔºö$5.99
  • Lifetime ProÔºö$14.99
  • Monthly ProÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Designed for e-ink enthusiasts, making your portable readers more powerful and easier to use. Seamlessly convert .ttf fonts and e-books on your phone into .bin fonts, XTC, or EPUB formats perfectly tuned for portable e-ink screens. [CORE FEATURES] ‚Ä¢ WYSIWYG Font Customization Import external .ttf fonts or use system fonts. Adjust line spacing, tracking, size, weight, and more with precision. Real-time simulation of various e-ink screens‚Äîpreview exactly how it looks before exporting. ‚Ä¢ Powerful E-book Toolbox Import various e-book formats to preview layouts directly on your phone. Customize formatting and convert to standard formats with a single tap. ‚Ä¢ Seamless Device Integration Wireless connection to supported devices for font pushing and file management. Supported Devices: XTEInk X4, EDCBook, Murphy 3.7, Wudada¬∑Little Ink, and more. ‚Ä¢ Privacy First & Offline 100% Offline: All processing is done locally on your device. No user data is ever uploaded. (Note: Network and Location permissions are required solely for connecting to your e-ink hardware.) [NOTE FROM DEVELOPER] This app is an indie project built with "AI Vibe Coding." While I strive for perfection, I cannot test every scenario. If you encounter any bugs, I appreciate your understanding. Thank you to all the "Community Supporters" for your feedback! Feel free to leave suggestions or comments. Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Description

„Äê‰∏ªË¶ÅÁâπËâ≤„Äë 1„ÄÅÂè§ËØóÊñá„ÄÅÂè§Á±çÁâπÂà´ÂÖ®ÔºåÂàÜÁ±ªËØ¶ÁªÜ 2„ÄÅÊ≥®ÈáäÁøªËØëËß£ÊûêË¥®ÈáèÊ≤âÂÆûÔºåÊúâÊãºÈü≥ÊâπÊ≥®Êñπ‰æøÊü•ÁúãÔºåËøòÊúâÊúóËØª 3„ÄÅÂÜÖÂÆπÊùÉÂ®ÅÔºåÊñáÁåÆËØÅÊòéÔºåÂÜÖÂµåÂ≠óÂÖ∏ÔºåËµèÊûêÂà∞‰Ωç 4„ÄÅÁïåÈù¢ÁÆÄÊ¥ÅÊ∏ÖÊñ∞ÂæàÊúâ‰ª£ÂÖ•ÊÑü 5„ÄÅÂäüËÉΩÂÆûÁî®Âø´Êç∑„ÄÅÊµèËßà‰∏ùÊªëÊñπ‰æøÔºåÂàÜÂ±è‰æøÊç∑ÔºåÊêúÁ¥¢ËøÖÈÄüÔºåÂºïÂØºÂêàÁêÜ „ÄêÂ≠¶ÁîüÂÖöÂøÖÂ§á„Äë Âè§ÊñáÂ∏¶ÊãºÈü≥+Áúü‰∫∫ÊúóËØªÔºåÊñáË®ÄÊñáÁ™ÅÂáªÁ•ûÂô® ‰∏≠È´òËÄÉÈ´òÈ¢ëËÄÉÁÇπËØóËØç‰∏ÄÈîÆÊî∂ËóèÔºåÊîØÊåÅ‰∏ãËΩΩ „ÄêÊñáËâ∫Áà±Â•ΩËÄÖ‰∏ìÂ±û„Äë ÊØèÊó•Êé®ÈÄÅÔºåAIÁÆóÊ≥ïÂåπÈÖç‰Ω†ÁöÑÂÆ°ÁæéÂÅèÂ•Ω ËæπÂê¨ÊúóËØµ„ÄäÈïøÁõ∏ÊÄù„ÄãÔºåËæπËµè‰ΩïÂΩìÂÖ±Ââ™Ë•øÁ™óÁÉõÔºåÂç¥ËØùÂ∑¥Â±±Â§úÈõ®Êó∂ „ÄêÂ≠¶ÊúØÁ†îÁ©∂Âà©Âô®„Äë Êî∂ÂΩï100‰∏á+ÊñáÁåÆËµÑÊñôÔºåÂê´„ÄäÂõõÂ∫ìÂÖ®‰π¶„Äã Êô∫ËÉΩÂØπÊØî‰∏çÂêåÁâàÊú¨Ê≥®ÈáäÔºåÊñáÁåÆÊ∫ØÊ∫êÊùÉÂ®Å ÂõõÂ§ßÊ†∏ÂøÉÁ´û‰∫âÂäõ ‚ë† ÊúÄÂÖ®ÊñáÂ∫ìÔºöË¶ÜÁõñÂÖàÁß¶Ëá≥ÊòéÊ∏Ö2‰∏á+‰ΩúËÄÖ‰ΩúÂìÅ ‚ë° Á≤æÂáÜËß£ÊûêÔºöÈôÑ„ÄêÂàõ‰ΩúËÉåÊôØ„Äë„ÄêÊñáË®ÄËØ≠Ê≥ï„Äë„ÄêÂÖ∏ÊïÖÊ∫ØÊ∫ê„Äë‰∏âÁª¥Ëß£ËØª ‚ë¢ ‰∫íÈªëÁßëÊäÄÔºöÂàÜÂ±èÂØπÁÖßÔºàÂéüÊñá/ËØëÊñá/Ê≥®Èáä/ËµèÊûê/ÊãºÈü≥Ëá™Áî±ÁªÑÂêàÔºâ ‚ë£ Èõ∂Âπ≤Êâ∞‰ΩìÈ™åÔºöÊ≤âÊµ∏ÂºèÈòÖËØª „ÄêËÆ¢ÈòÖÂèäÂçïË¥≠ËØ¥Êòé„Äë ‰∏Ä„ÄÅÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëòËá™Âä®ËÆ¢ÈòÖËØ¥Êòé 1. ÊúçÂä°ÂêçÁß∞ÔºöËÆ¢ÈòÖÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëò 2. ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®ÊúüÔºö1‰∏™Êúà„ÄÅ6‰∏™ÊúàÂíå12‰∏™Êúà 3. ÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëò‰ª∑Ê†ºÔºö10ÂÖÉ/1‰∏™Êúà„ÄÅ50ÂÖÉ/6‰∏™ÊúàÂíå85ÂÖÉ/12‰∏™Êúà„ÄÇ 4. Â¶ÇÈúÄÂèñÊ∂àËÆ¢ÈòÖÔºåËØ∑ÊâãÂä®ÊâìÂºÄiOSÁöÑ‚ÄúËÆæÁΩÆ‚Äù -->ËøõÂÖ•‚ÄúiTunes Store ‰∏é App Store‚Äù-->ÁÇπÂáª‚ÄúApple ID‚ÄùÔºåÈÄâÊã©"Êü•ÁúãApple ID"ÔºåËøõÂÖ•"Ë¥¶Êà∑ËÆæÁΩÆ"È°µÈù¢ÔºåÁÇπÂáª‚ÄúËÆ¢ÈòÖ‚ÄùÔºåÈÄâÊã©Âè§ÊñáÂ≤õÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëòÂèñÊ∂àËÆ¢ÈòÖÂç≥ÂèØ„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊú™Âú®ËÆ¢ÈòÖÊúüÁªìÊùüÁöÑËá≥Â∞ë24Â∞èÊó∂ÂâçÂÖ≥Èó≠ËÆ¢ÈòÖÔºåÊ≠§ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂ∞Ü‰ºöËá™Âä®Áª≠ËÆ¢„ÄÇ ‰∫å„ÄÅÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëòÊ∞∏‰πÖÂçïÊ¨°‰ªòË¥πËØ¥Êòé 1.ÊúçÂä°ÂêçÁß∞ÔºöÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëòÊ∞∏‰πÖ 2.ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®ÊúüÔºöÊ∞∏‰πÖ 3.Ëã•ÊÇ®‰ªéAppStoreË¥≠‰π∞ÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëòÊ∞∏‰πÖÔºåÂàô‰∏∫ÂçïÊ¨°‰ªòË¥πÊ∞∏‰πÖÁîüÊïà ‰∏â„ÄÅÂÖ∂ÂÆÉÂçïÊ¨°‰ªòË¥πËØ¥Êòé 1.ÊúçÂä°ÂêçÁß∞Ôºö‰∏ãËΩΩÂåÖ 2.ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®ÊúüÔºöÂçïÊ¨° 3.Ëã•ÊÇ®‰ªéAppStoreË¥≠‰π∞‰∏ãËΩΩÂåÖÔºåÂàô‰∏∫ÂçïÊ¨°‰ªòË¥πÂçïÊ¨°ÁîüÊïà Âõõ„ÄÅÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÂçèËÆÆ 1. entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö$9.99

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Today‚Äôs Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization ‚Ä¢ Unlimited notes storage ‚Ä¢ Multiple note colors ‚Ä¢ Pinned & private notes ‚Ä¢ Custom font styles & font sizes ‚Ä¢ Sort notes by name or date ‚Ä¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time ‚Ä¢ Easy note sharing ‚Ä¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security ‚Ä¢ App lock with multiple passcode options ‚Ä¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync ‚Ä¢ iCloud sync for notes ‚Ä¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications ‚Ä¢ Widget for today‚Äôs notes ‚Ä¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager ‚Ä¢ Create and manage PDF files ‚Ä¢ Edit existing PDFs ‚Ä¢ Export notes as PDF ‚Ä¢ Share PDFs easily ‚Ä¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs ‚Ä¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. We‚Äôre committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

entry.title: Titan Quest HD
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$0.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Immortal Throne DLCÔºö$4.99
  • Ragnar√∂k DLCÔºö$4.99
  • Atlantis DLCÔºö$4.99
  • Eternal Embers DLCÔºö$4.99

Application Description

One of the best hack-and-slash games of all time now fits in your pocket! Originally released on PC in 2006, Titan Quest is an action RPG set against a mythological backdrop. The Titans have escaped from prison and are hell-bent on destroying the Earth. The Gods alone can‚Äôt stop them -- a hero is needed to lead this epic struggle. Victory or defeat will determine humanity‚Äôs fate and that of the Olympians. You are that hero! Create your character, explore ancient civilizations like Greece, Egypt, Babylon, and China, and fight against hordes of legendary creatures! Master the arts of archery, swordsmanship or magic and upgrade your character to unlock awesome powers! Discover special items to help you complete your quest: legendary swords, devastating thunderbolts, enchanted bows, and much more! Specially adapted for mobile devices, this new version offers numerous new features: ‚óè A new touch-friendly interface ‚óè Completely redesigned touch-friendly gameplay ‚óè High-quality graphics ‚óè A huge, open world to explore ‚óè Full day/night cycle ‚óè 80 different mythological creatures: Minotaurs, Cyclopses, Gorgons, and many more ‚óè 1200+ items to discover ‚óè 30 different character classes ‚óè 150 different character skills ‚óè Colossal playtime of more than 60 hours ‚óè Scalable difficulty modes: weapons and enemies match your skill level ‚óè Dozens of unlockable achievements to discover ‚óè No ads, no microtransactions. Mixing ancient mythology with non-stop action, Titan Quest is a classic hack-and-slash offering energizing gameplay with a fast, intense rhythm. Overcome thrilling challenges and vanquish the greatest enemies ever to invade the mobile world! DLCs available as in-app purchase: ‚óè IMMORTAL THRONE - Encounter the greatest villains of Greek mythology, brave the attacks of Cerberus, and hazard the banks of the River Styx to conquer this dark new adventure. ‚óè RAGNAR√ñK - In the uncharted lands of northern Europe, you‚Äôll brave the realms of the Celts, the Northmen, and the Asgardian gods! ‚óè ATLANTIS - Set out on a journey across the western Mediterranean, in search of the mythical kingdom of Atlantis. Including the Tartarus Arena for epic battles! ‚óè ETERNAL EMBERS - Summoned by the legendary Emperor Yao, the Hero is called back into the East to deal with a demonic threat that has been ravaging the land after the Telkine was slain.

Application Description

Take to the battlefield with Wargroove, the award-winning strategy game - now on mobile! Play solo or with friends with Local & Online Multiplayer. Choose your Commander and wage turn-based war on battling factions. Design and share maps, cutscenes and campaigns with easy-to-use editors and in-depth customization tools! Wargroove 2: Pocket Edition offers retro turn-based tactical combat on the go, bringing the latest and greatest entry in the series, Wargroove 2, to mobile devices, with fully optimised and intuitive touchscreen controls - ready to play anywhere! GAME FEATURES ‚ñ† Trouble stirs in Aurania - battle your way through a 20-hour Campaign, with 3 interweaving stories! ‚ñ† Experience a new story with retro-inspired turn-based tactics gameplay of Wargroove - now on mobile! ‚ñ† Battle with or against friends with Local Multiplayer - just pass the device & play! ‚ñ† Online Multiplayer up to 4 players, cross-platform play to other versions of Wargroove 2 ‚ñ† A vibrant cast of 20+ Commanders & 6 warring Factions ‚ñ† Unique ultimate moves! Unleash your Commander‚Äôs powerful Groove ability to turn the tide of battle. ‚ñ† Create, customize and share with in-depth customisation tools ‚ñ† Lead a roguelike conquest! A challenging game mode dedicated to putting your tactical abilities to the test ‚ñ† Build your army and refine your strategy with unique unit types, maximise your army‚Äôs impact with critical moves ‚ñ† Play with up two four players locally or online! Simply pass the device around or connect online with cross-platform play.

entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff‚Äôs department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions ‚Äì and try to keep out of prison yourself! ‚Äì in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It‚Äôs all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn‚Äôt spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriff‚Äôs department. Your subordinates aren‚Äôt just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices ‚Äì and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You‚Äôll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment ‚Äì if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn‚Äôt have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing ‚ÄòTHIS IS THE POLICE 2‚Äô! Get in touch with HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com Join us on Facebook: HandyGames Subscribe to our YouTube channel: HandyGames Check news on Twitter: @handy_games Follow us on Instagram: handygames Imprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/ ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

The Squadron has reached your mobile device! Dodge a bullet storm and face fearsome aerial war machines! Lead your squadron to victory in two different campaigns, full of story twists and legendary boss fights! ACES OF THE LUFTWAFFE - SQUADRON is an action-packed vertical scrolling shoot‚Äò em-up with a fascinating and fully voiced narrative. Dodge bullets, collect massive power-ups and wisely use special abilities to defeat your enemies. Two campaigns with 50 levels in total, waves of various deadly enemies and a lot of epic boss fights. Are you up to this task? When Europe seemed to be free, a secret German commando called The Aces of the Luftwaffe took their chance to strike back and invade the USA! It‚Äôs your duty to restore peace and liberty aboard deadly wings of steel in bombastic air battles! However, every story has two sides. While the Aces of Luftwaffe begin their assault on the United States, you are charged with leading a squad of elite German pilots on a secret mission. Embarc on an epic aerial adventure of intrigue and deceit from a secret base in the Bermuda Triangle. Choose your side, decide your role and take off! - Action-packed Shoot ‚Äôem up with explosive special effects - Heroic NPC wingmen that will follow your order - Skill trees with individual abilities for each wingman - Challenging achievement system - Captivating storyline with fully voiced characters - 50 levels and exciting missions¬† - 12 spectacular boss fights - Epic movie-like orchestral soundtrack

Application Description

The battle continues after ‚Äú1941 Frozen Front‚Äù ‚Äì and this time, it‚Äôs all about naval warfare! Join the navy and fight to win the battle of your life! Own the battlefield and send your soldiers to the frontline. Military combat at its best! Choose the right tactics and use your commando to defeat the enemy! Lead the U.S. Army on their campaign or command the Japanese forces on their mission! Take out enemy alliances with infantry, artillery, tanks, warplanes, battleships and submarines and earn your stripes as an ingenious commander at the PACIFIC FRONT! *** MISSION BRIEFING *** FIGHT with powerful weapons like torpedos and bombs! TAKE OUT enemy positions with tanks and infantry! BOMBARD hostile headquarters with mighty bomber wings! SURPRISE the enemy with attacks from your submarine! EMPLACE your artillery in rough terrain! CLEAR beaches, lagoons and straits! AMBUSH the enemy! SUPPLY your army with goods and ammunition! DEFEND your aircraft carriers and battleships! Features: - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - Turn-based strategy action set in WW2 - Thrilling campaigns and challenging missions - Historical U.S. and Japanese units - Infantry, artillery, tanks, warplanes, battleships and submarines for both fractions - Repairs, camouflage and fortification of units during the battles - Hot-hand multiplayer battles - Hex grid for the best overview possible - Detailed graphics and super-realistic sounds - Full tablet support Thank you for playing ‚Äò1942 Pacific Front‚Äô! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: Roundguard
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $2.19 [$2.19 ~ $6.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.19

Application Description

Roundguard is a bouncy dungeon crawler with pinball physics, lots of loot, and a randomized castle full of oddballs. Highly-rated former Apple Arcade game and Mobile Game of the Year nominee! If you love roguelikes & Peggle, then Roundguard is for you. Press your luck against hordes of dangerously cute monsters and challenging roguelike elements in this all-round bouncy adventure! Bouncy Fun: Intuitive pinball physics-based gameplay like no other dungeon crawler. Multiple Classes: Play as the Warrior, the Rogue, the Wizard, or the Druid, each with their own unique skills, items, and cheeky sense of humor. Show Off Your Skills: Compete on the leaderboards and try to master all the challenging, rule-bending relics. Earn all the Encore roses in an escalating series of difficulty ranks for each hero. Daily Puzzles: A new short puzzle every day to test your skills. Weekly Runs: New special rules each week. Compete against the world on dedicated weekly leaderboards. Randomized Dungeon: Each time you play, levels are procedurally generated, and quest events and elite monsters are randomly placed. Permadeath with Benefits: When you die, you‚Äôll have a chance to bring a special trinket with you on your next run. The more gold you grab, the better your chances to collect one of the most powerful trinkets. A Cast of Oddballs: Chat with the castle‚Äôs colorful cast to pick up quests and learn why some rats want their king dead, what‚Äôs irritating the local teenage skeleton today, or what the Warrior will do if you can‚Äôt get to a bathroom quickly enough. Lots of Loot: Over 200 items and trinkets, each with effects that present strategic choices and combo possibilities.

entry.title: Dead Cells
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$8.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $8.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • The Bad SeedÔºö$3.99
  • Fatal FallsÔºö$3.99
  • The Queen and the SeaÔºö$3.99
  • Return to CastlevaniaÔºö$6.99

Application Description

Death is not the end. Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island‚Ä¶! That is, assuming you‚Äôre able to fight your way past its keepers. Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss. Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile! Main Features ‚Ä¢ Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath ‚Ä¢ Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies‚Äô patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say ‚Äúbaguette‚Äù ‚Ä¢ Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. Surely, the ramparts can‚Äôt be as bad as the sewers, right? ‚Ä¢ Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end? *Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near* RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC Time for some vampire slaying ‚Ä¢ New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont, ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts ‚Ä¢ 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you ‚Ä¢ 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night, ‚Ä¢ 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself ‚Ä¢ 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard ‚Ä¢ Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells THE BAD SEED DLC You reap what you sow ‚Ä¢ New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished ‚Ä¢ New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter ‚Ä¢ New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki ‚Ä¢ New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you FATAL FALLS DLC Ready for a leap of faith? ‚Ä¢ 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum ‚Ä¢ 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...? ‚Ä¢ 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir... ‚Ä¢ 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off QUEEN AND THE SEA DLC Take it to the sea! ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet. ‚Ä¢ 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). ‚Ä¢ 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen! This DLC also gives you the usual extras: - A not-so-cute pet. - Loads of new outfits. - New enemies to bash. WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM. Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface ‚Ä¢ Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit ‚Ä¢ Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttons‚Äô position and size to your liking, swipe to dodge‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ MFi external controller support ‚Ä¢ No ads, no F2P mechanics! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue.

Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$0.29 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music! A comprehensive set of tools for any musician: * Chord Progression: Create beautiful chord progressions with full flexibility - use inversions, sus2, sus4, 7th, 9th, and more. Enjoy live playback as piano or synth, or send MIDI directly to your macOS computer! * MIDI Keyboard: Transform your phone into a MIDI keyboard for your macOS computer (compatible with macOS Catalina and newer). * Notation Practice: Practice reading notes in both treble and bass clefs. * Chord Calculation: Help you learn how to calculate chords and progressions. * Interval Practice: Practice recognizing and comparing musical intervals by ear. * Voice & Ear Training: Simple, effective tools for voice practice and ear training. Plus, enjoy the macOS version included with your purchase!

entry.title: Onyx Magic
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$69.99 ‚Üí $64.99 [$54.99 ~ $69.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$64.99

In-App Purchases

  • 100 Onyx CreditsÔºö$24.99

Application Description

Onyx is a revolutionary new utility that allows you to modify a captured image in real-time using variable input data. Using cutting edge AI processing, Onyx lets you remotely create seamless alterations to photos moments after they've been taken - all with your spectator's camera. For example: ‚Äî Make a playing card appear in your spectator's wallet. ‚Äî Morph your spectator's shadow to look like their thought of animal. ‚Äî Take a photo of your spectator holding a signed card. They name *any* other card. The signed card in the photo transforms to match their thought. ‚Äî Supplement your Gypsy Queen routine with Onyx, allowing you to zoom in on a photo of your spectator holding the Queen of Hearts for the reveal. ‚Äî Reveal a thought-of word, name, or initials hidden naturally in the light reflections of a spectator's eye. ‚Äî Change the time on a photo of a clock. ‚Äî Remove your spectator's wristwatch in a photo, making it seem that it was removed earlier. ...and more! If you can describe it, Onyx can likely create it. Onyx is particularly great for a reveal within something ephemeral. Take a photo of someone's shadow, a landscape shot of the clouds, a flicker on a TV screen or more, and Onyx will realistically insert their free choice. * Variable Delayed Input Inspired by the popular variable trigger system featured in DFB X, Onyx pauses and automatically waits for input, letting you remotely modify a photo *after* it's been taken. * Cutting Edge Technology Take a photo, then have your spectator make a free choice. Onyx's advanced technology seamlessly transforms the photo remotely. * Create Unlimited Effects Change signed playing cards, reveal initials and names, or modify writing. Reveal *anything you can imagine* within a genuine photo you just took. * Your Integrations. Their Camera The effect happens entirely with the spectator's camera. With Onyx's powerful integrations, your phone never needs to leave your pocket. * Invisible, Advanced Technology As only the spectator's device is in play, Onyx's advanced technology remains hidden and inconspicuous. * Third Party Integrations Use your favourite magic apps' input methods, including: ‚Äî Earworm's covert typing Web Search & Notes input ‚Äî Native voice input ‚Äî WebFX's Wrist Gestures ‚Äî WikiTest ‚Äî PeekSmith ‚Äî Bridge ...and any compatible third-party app. Onyx is a tool specifically designed for entertainment purposes. It uses purchaseable in-app credits or a funded OpenRouter account for best-in-class automatic edits. Onyx supports: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Chinese simplified and traditional, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
